channel.title: Check Printing on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in Check Printing on 0x000216

item.title: Affordable Check and Signature Verification
item.description: While many third-party products offer enhanced check printing security for Microsoft Dynamics GP, most come with extra features like MICR printing that not all clients need or want. This often comes with additional costs. So, how can you control check printing in Microsoft Dynamics GP without relying on these products? Enable Batch Posting Control Navigate to Tools > Setup > Posting > Posting and enable the option for batch approvals. Set a password for Series: Purchasing, Origin: Computer Checks.
